vulnerability.name: USN-6823-1
vulnerability.description: Multiple security issues were discovered in MySQL and this update includes new upstream MySQL versions to fix these issues.  MySQL has been updated to 8.0.37 in Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, Ubuntu 22.04 LTS, Ubuntu 23.10, and Ubuntu 24.04 LTS.  In addition to security fixes, the updated packages contain bug fixes, new features, and possibly incompatible changes.  Please see the following for more information:  https://dev.mysql.com/doc/relnotes/mysql/8.0/en/news-8-0-37.html https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/cpuapr2024.html

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in MySQL.
